description: This file sets up and configures an AI agent for video captioning, utilizing various tools and models such as MoviePyVideoTools and OpenAIChat, and defines the agent's behavior and instructions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model, tools, and instructions for a specific task.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: MoviePyVideoTools
classes.description: A set of tools for processing videos using MoviePy.

classes.name: OpenAITools
classes.description: A collection of tools for interacting with OpenAI services.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response message from the agent.
